alert.note: Alert for Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:48AM EDT until July 28 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NEWTON AND NORTHERN JASPER COUNTIES... At 648 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roselawn, or near DeMotte, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... DeMotte, Wheatfield, Roselawn, Fair Oaks, Thayer, Baileys Corner and Stoutsburg. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 225 and 235. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
